articles.title: Perez says Safety Car 'ruined' his chance of victory from pole position at Jeddah | Formula 1® - Formula 1
articles.description: Sergio Perez went from the high of his first career pole position to the disappointment of finishing fourth in Sunday’s Saudi Arabian Grand Prix – a result for which he blamed an inopportune Safety Car.
